#include <iostream>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string a;
        cin>>a;
        long long int sum=0;
        for(unsigned int i=0;i<a.size();i++)
        {
            if(a[i]=='0'||a[i]=='1'||a[i]=='2'||a[i]=='3'||a[i]=='4'||a[i]=='5'||a[i]=='6'||a[i]=='7'||a[i]=='8'||a[i]=='9')
                sum+=(a[i]-'0');
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
